Summary: Four Orange Glowish Oval UFO hovering in Raw Slowly near Bordeaux
trends: There have been no other sightings in Bordeaux
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting details- from carignan de bordeaux near bordeaux city aquitaine gironde at home from my garden. in the nigth of 15 august to 16 august 2009 at 00.23 am . my dog came outside then i follow him to play,then my eyes where cathed out by 4 red\glowish orange oval ligths in an horizontal raw formation .sky were very clear no fog , no clouds they came from north\north-est about 20��� above the horizon line. ( my first impression was that they were army copter but without signalisation fire-ligth but very soon i saw that their configuration were absolutly incompatible with known human flying craft & neither fire works of course....!!!) - the 4 ufo where hovering slowly in my direction within perfect silence during 2 minutes... during this time i ran in my house to cath my binocular & came back to my garden .then they turn to east\south-east direction at the same speed than before,which mean slowly. - these ufo, now were following each other in line during 1.30 other minutes...then suddenly the first & the second one in the line vanish as if they dematerialised in transluscent state ... 20 secondes after the 2 others ufo craft made the same & vanish as the same way . during this observation these cratf stayed at an constant slow speed. - my nickname is elyansun and i swear on my honor that this declaration is genuine - my personal information are reserved only to mufon's direction office and mufon's confirm third parties confirmed friends organisation for investigations purpose,thanks a lot. ps:joined snapshot are not mine but the 4 ufo i saw 15 aout 2009 at 00.23 am bordeaux are 100% the same than az, august 13. 2009 mufon case:#18658
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
